description:
Amazing Smoke App (Smoking simulator). 

Features:

✓ Cigarette. 
✓ Pipe. 
✓ Cigar 


Some of the main effects included are: 

✓ Smoke emission from the cigar,pipe and cigarette. 
✓ You can also "touch" the screen to increase this previous effect. 
✓ As in a real one, ashes will come off when too much gets accumulated or you can manually drop using the button in the lower left corner. 

“Cannot believe no one had come up with this great idea before” 
“Great application to show of with your friends!” 
“You’ve got to try it once; seeing is believing!” 
"Perfect to quit smoking!" 
Those were just a few of the reactions we got from our focus group… 
This is a very simple yet creative application; it works by graphically pretending you are smoking on your device. 
“Amazing graphics and effects!” 
Words and picture previews cannot describe how impressive this application is. Try it; unlike the real thing, you won’t regret it! 
We are constantly working on this and similar applications; please feel free to share with us any ideas or suggestions you may have.
